#include <mdp_postscript.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

to output and draw in postscript

Example: 

///    mdp_postscript ps("test.ps");
///    ps.color(0.2,0.2,0.7);
///    ps.line(0,0,  5,5);
///    ps.print(5,5,"a line from (0,0) to here");
///
